name: Peasant Militia
uniques: +10% [Combat Strength] when fighting on tiles with [Farm] improvements
+10% [Combat Strength] when fighting near cities with [Walls]
description: The Peasant Militia is a symbol of Bohemian resilience, representing the common folk rising to defend their homeland. Though primarily tasked with labor, these militias are capable of standing up to invaders with surprising strength, especially when defending their farms, hills, or cities fortified with walls. Their knowledge of the land grants them defensive advantages, making them a key unit in Bohemian resistance.
